headline: ASG: Discount Presents A Better Opportunity
summary: ASG trades at an ~8% discount with growth exposure across all caps, now tilted toward mega-cap tech, and offers tax-friendly distributions. See why ASG CEF is a buy.

raw.headline: ASG: Discount Presents A Better Opportunity

headline: The BLSH Strategy: The Compounding Machine
summary: The BLSH strategy uses rules-based signals to buy undervalued blue chips and sell at highs, delivering 14.8% CAGR over 30 years. Learn why this method beats the S&P 500.
